message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 3-7-2, translated into all languages

data.en: Survey estimates are based on standardized methodology, using the WHO Child Growth Standards, as described in (Ref: Anthro software manual). Global and regional estimates are based on the methodology described at UNICEF-WHO, World Bank: Joint estimates of child malnutrition - levels and trends (UNICEF / WHO / BM)
data.pt: As estimativas dos inquéritos são baseadas em metodologia padronizada, usando os Padrões de Crescimento Infantil da OMS, conforme descrito no (Ref: manual do software Anthro). As estimativas globais e regionais são baseadas na metodologia descrita no UNICEF-OMS, Banco Mundial: Estimativas conjuntas de desnutrição infantil - Níveis e tendências (UNICEF / OMS / BM)
